questions.text: During the past month, what time have you usually gone to bed at night?
During the past month, how long (in minutes) has it usually taken you to fall asleep each night?
During the past month, what time have you usually gotten up in the morning?
During the past month, how many hours of actual sleep did you get at night? (This may be different than the number of hours you spent in bed)

options.label: At least 6 but less than 7 hours
At least 5 but less than 6 hours

questions.text: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... Cannot get to sleep within 30 minutes?

options.label: Three or more times a week

questions.text: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... Wake up in the middle of the night or early morning?

options.label: Three or more times a week

questions.text: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... Have to get up to use the bathroom?

options.label: Three or more times a week

questions.text: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... Cannot breathe comfortably?

options.label: Three or more times a week

questions.text: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... Cough or snore loudly?

options.label: Three or more times a week

questions.text: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... Feel too cold?

options.label: Three or more times a week

questions.text: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... Feel too hot?

options.label: Three or more times a week

questions.text: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... Have bad dreams?

options.label: Three or more times a week

questions.text: During the past month, how often have you had trouble sleeping because you... Have pain?

options.label: Three or more times a week

questions.text: During the past month, how often have you taken medicine to help you sleep (prescribed or over the counter)?

options.label: Three or more times a week

questions.text: During the past month, how often have you had trouble staying awake while driving, eating meals, or engaging in social activities?

options.label: Three or more times a week

questions.text: During the past month, how much of a problem has it been for you to keep up enough enthusiasm to get things done?
During the past month, how would you rate your sleep quality overall?
